<div class="asset-content subscriber-premium" itemprop="articleBody">
<p><strong>VALDOSTA, Ga. (WTXL)</strong> - The City of Valdosta is apologizing after coliform bacteria was found in the city's drinking water.</p><p>The city says in July 2014, a scheduled water sample of the Valdosta water distribution system showed a maximum contaminant level violation for coliform bacteria.</p><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_top"></div><p>While the water has since been cleared of the contaminants, the city has included a letter with citizens' October utility bill explaining the drinking water violation.</p><p>Utilities director Henry Hinks, says, "Although this incident was not an emergency and poses no threat to water customers, citizens have a right to know what happened and what we did to correct the situation."</p><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_middle"></div><p>Citizens can find more information about this at <a href="http://www.valdostacity.com">www.valdostacity.com</a>.</p><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_bottom"></div>
</div>

Cedarville Residents Asked To Boil Water

Monday
OctÂ 13,Â 2014Â atÂ 2:42Â AM OctÂ 13,Â 2014Â atÂ 8:41Â AM

The Arkansas Department of Health has issued a boil water notice for 45 customers of the Cedarville Waterworks.

The Arkansas Department of Health has issued a boil water notice for 45 customers of the Cedarville Waterworks.


Customers affected are on part of the system at Natural Dam, along north Arkansas 59 from Independence to East Rodeo, including West Rodeo and Natural Dam Road and Grandview and Independence, according to a news release.


The order was issued because of a water main break.


Under the order, all affected customers are advised the water may be unsafe for human use, the release states. Users should briskly boil all water for drinking and food preparation for one minute prior to use. Ice cubes should be discarded and only boiled water used for making ice.


The order will remain in effect until the problem has been corrected and bacterial tests show the water is safe to drink, the release states.

Please look at the time stamp on the story to see when it was last updated.</div> <article class="post-176170 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news tag-coal-valley-boil-order" id="post-176170">
<div class="entry-content">
<div class="alignright wp-post-thumbnail">
<a data-keyboard="true" data-toggle="modal" href="#thumbnail-modal">
<img alt="" class=" wp-post-image" height="225" sizes="(max-width: 400px) 100vw, 400px" src="https://localtvwqad.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/boil-order.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&w=400&h=225&crop=1" srcset="https://localtvwqad.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/boil-order.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&w=400&h=225&crop=1 400w, https://localtvwqad.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/boil-order.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&w=150&h=84&crop=1 150w, https://localtvwqad.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/boil-order.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&w=300&h=169&crop=1 300w" width="400"/> </a>
</div>
<div class="modal hide fade" id="thumbnail-modal" tabindex="-1">
<div class="modal-header">
<button aria-hidden="true" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">Ã</button>
<h4 class="title">Boil order issued in CoalÂ Valley</h4>
</div>
<div class="modal-body">
<img alt="" class="attachment-gallery-cover size-gallery-cover wp-post-image" height="480" sizes="(max-width: 640px) 100vw, 640px" src="https://localtvwqad.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/boil-order.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&w=640" srcset="https://localtvwqad.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/boil-order.jpg 640w, https://localtvwqad.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/boil-order.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&w=150 150w, https://localtvwqad.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/boil-order.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&w=300 300w" width="640"/> <div class="lightbox-caption"></div>
</div>
</div>
<p>A boil order was issued for much of the northern part of the Village of Coal Valley after a pump went down at one of the wells there.</p>
<p>The boil order advisory was issued Monday afternoon, October 13, 2014.</p>
<p>Residents in the affected area are advised to boil water for five minutes before it is used for drinking, cooking or dishwashing.</p>
<p>The boil order area was from Niabi Zoo Road west to West 17th Street, from Route 6 south to about 3rd Avenue.Â  The boil order area included The Ridges and Whispering Hills subdivisions.</p>
<p>After repairs are made, water sample tests must indicate no dangerous contaminants before the boil order can be lifted.</p>
<p>Coal Valley officials hoped to have samples back to possibly lift the boil order by Wednesday, October 15.</p>
</div>

    var compatible = true;

var bloxHasSubscription = false;
            var bloxServiceVerified = $.cookie('tncms-services-verified');

            /* if service not whitelisted check user service */
            if( bloxServiceVerified != 1 ){
                var bloxServiceIDs = [];
                
                    bloxServiceIDs.push(5594);
                
                    bloxServiceIDs.push(4597);
                
                    bloxServiceIDs.push(4598);
                
                    bloxServiceIDs.push(4600);
                
                if (__tnt.user.services){
                    var bloxUserServiceIDs = __tnt.user.services.replace('%2C',',').split(',');
                    $.each(bloxUserServiceIDs, function(index, value){
                        var serviceID = parseInt(value);
                        if( serviceID != 0 ){
                            if( $.inArray(serviceID, bloxServiceIDs) > -1 ){
                                bloxHasSubscription = true;
                                return false;
                            }
                        }else{
                            bloxHasSubscription = true;
                            return false;
                        }
                    });
                }
            /* service has been whitelisted */
            } else {
                bloxHasSubscription = true;
            }

            /* check for whitelists once per day */
            if( !bloxHasSubscription && !bloxServiceVerified && typeof userWhiteList != 'undefined' && $.isArray(userWhiteList) ) {
                $.getJSON("http://poststar.com/_services/v1/client_ip_info",function(data){
                    /* create a range */
                    var dataRange = data.ip.split('.');
                    dataRange = dataRange[0]+'.'+dataRange[1]+'.'+dataRange[2];
                    if( jQuery.inArray(data.ip, userWhiteList) > -1 || jQuery.inArray(dataRange, userWhiteList) > -1 ){
                        /* white list machine */
                        $.cookie('tncms-service-validated', 1, { path:'/' });

                        bloxHasSubscription = true;
                    } else {
                        $.cookie('tncms-service-validated', 0, { path:'/', expires:1 });
                        
                        __tnt.metering.check();
                    }
                });

            /* no access */
            }else if( !bloxHasSubscription ){
                __tnt.metering.check();
            }
            
            if(bloxHasSubscription){
                $('.subscriber-only.encrypted-content').each(function(){
                    $(this).html(tncms.unscramble($(this).text()));
                    $(this).show();
                });
                $('.subscriber-hide').show();
            }

            // show main content div
            $('#site-container').show();

            // hide loading spinner
            $('.subscriber-load').hide();
        });

<div class="asset-content p402_premium subscriber-premium" itemprop="articleBody">
<div class="subscriber-preview"><p>GREENWICH -- Village residents should boil their water beginning at 7 a.m. Tuesday and continuing until further notice.</p></div><div class="subscriber-preview"><p>The state Department of Health has instructed the village to issue the notice due to construction upgrades on the water system.</p></div><div class="tnt-ads-container text-center hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg"><div class="tnt-ads dfp-ad" data-dfp-adunit="/8438/poststar.com/news/local" data-dfp-custom-pos="fixed-big-ad-top, atf" data-dfp-size="[300,250]" id="fixed-big-ad-top-mobile" style="min-height:250px; min-width:300px;"></div></div>
<div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_top"></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>Residents should continue to boil their water until they have been notified the boil water notice has been lifted.</p></div><div class="tnt-ads-container text-center "><div class="tnt-ads dfp-ad" data-dfp-adunit="/8438/poststar.com/news/local" data-dfp-custom-pos="fixed-inline-video, stf" data-dfp-size="[4,1]" data-lazy="true" id="fixed-inline-video" style="min-height:1px; min-width:4px;"></div></div>
<div class="subscriber-only"><p>The reverse 911 system will be used to notify users when the boil water notice begins and when it is lifted.</p></div><div class="tnt-ads-container text-center hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg"><div class="tnt-ads dfp-ad" data-dfp-adunit="/8438/poststar.com/news/local" data-dfp-custom-pos="fixed-big-ad-middle, stf" data-dfp-size="[300,250]" id="fixed-big-ad-middle-mobile" style="min-height:250px; min-width:300px;"></div></div>
<div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_middle"><div class="tncms-block" id="tncms-block-1420333"></div></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>Contact the village clerkâs office at 692-2755 for more information.</p></div><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_bottom"><div class="tncms-block" id="tncms-block-1420330"></div></div>
</div>

<div class="infinity-summary-container hidden-print" id="infinite-container">
<div data-next-url="http://poststar.com/tncms/search/mlt/?origin=431d2026-52e4-11e4-9fee-876331b7e979&app=editorial&inline=infinity&type=article%2Ccollection%2Cvideo%2Cyoutube" id="infinite-more">
<i class="fa fa-spinner fa-pulse"></i>
</div>
</div>
<script>
        
            var bFoundOrigin = true;
            var sOriginID = null;
        
        var sOriginURL = scrubURL('http://poststar.com/tncms/search/mlt/?origin=431d2026-52e4-11e4-9fee-876331b7e979&app=editorial&inline=infinity&type=article%2Ccollection%2Cvideo%2Cyoutube'); // original url scrubbed for preview
        var sFirstID = null;
        var bFirstRun = true;
        var bShowAd = true;
        var bInfiniStop = false;

        function populateInfinitySet(sURL) {
            sURL = scrubURL(sURL);

            // Until the origin paramter for cms.search.mlt functions, we have to start/stop the looping on our own
            // This will require not displaying any assets until we hit oAsset.
            // Then we loop through and display until we've been through everything up to our origin

            $.ajax(sURL).then(function(oResponse, sStatus, oXHR) {

                var sNextUrl = null;

                if (typeof oResponse.next_url == 'undefined') {
                    // URL supplied is no good. Revert to original URL
                    sNextUrl = sOriginURL;
                } else {
                    sNextUrl = scrubURL(oResponse.next_url);
                }

                // Manage response
                if (typeof oResponse.assets != 'undefined' && oResponse.assets.length > 0) {
                    
                    // Remove old more data
                    $("#infinite-more").remove();

                    
                    // Build infinity set
                    $.each(oResponse.assets, function(index) {
                            if (index == 1 && sOriginID == null) {
                                sOriginID = oResponse.assets[0].id;
                            }
                        // Display assets once origin is found
                        if (bFoundOrigin == true) {
                            if (this.id == sOriginID) {
                                bInfiniStop = true;
                                sNextUrl = null;
                                $("#infinite-more").remove();
                                
                            } else if (bInfiniStop == false && this.id != '431d2026-52e4-11e4-9fee-876331b7e979') {
                                // Display asset
                                var sHTML = '';
                                if (this.content) {
                                    sHTML += '<div class="infinite-item original row"><div class="col-md-8">' + this.content + '</div><div class="col-md-4 text-center">';
                                    if (bShowAd == true) {
                                        // Show advertisement
                                        sHTML += '<div class="infinity-ad empty"></div>'
                                        bShowAd = false;
                                    } else {
                                        bShowAd = true;
                                    }
                                    sHTML += '</div></div><hr>';
                                }
                            }
                        } else {
                            if (this.id == sOriginID) {
                                // Origin found. Begin displaying assets
                                bFoundOrigin = true;
                            } else {
                                // Origin found is false. Skip asset
                                // Fail-safe in case origin is not present in set. This can be removed when origin is fixed.
                                if (bFirstRun == true) {
                                    // Stored first id
                                    sFirstID = this.id;
                                    bFirstRun = false;
                                } else if (this.id == sFirstID) {
                                    // We've started again. Force origin
                                    sOriginID = sFirstID;
                                    bFoundOrigin = true;
                                } // end Fail-safe
                            }
                        }
                        // Append infinity set to container
                        $("#infinite-container").append(sHTML);
                    });

                    // Include block_id on newly added list items
                    $('#infinite-container .infinite-item.original').each(function() {
                        var sHref = scrubURL($(this).find(".card-headline a").attr("href"));
                        
                        // Add to image and headlines links
                        $(this).removeClass('original')
                            .find(".card-headline a, .image a")
                            .attr("href", sHref + "#tncms-source=infinity-scroll-summary-siderail-latest");
                    });

                    // Check next URL
                    if (sNextUrl) {
                        // if origin hasn't been found yet and we hit next_url. Trigger the set to pull in again.
                        if (bFoundOrigin == false) {
                            // No origin yet. Call the populate function
                            populateInfinitySet(sNextUrl);
                        } else {
                            // Append sNextUrl to infinity set
                            $("#infinite-container").append('<div id="infinite-more" data-next-url="' + sNextUrl + '"><i class="fa fa-spinner fa-pulse"></i></div>');
                        }
                    }
                    
                        // Ad waypoint and handler to insert ads next to summary
                        $('.infinity-ad.empty').waypoint({
                            offset: '80%',
                            handler: function(direction) {
                                // Kill waypoint
                                this.destroy();
                                $(this.element).removeClass('empty');
                                // Create and append ad iframe. Make sure this occurs only once
                                var newIframe = infinityAd();
                                if($(this.element).children().length <= 0) {
                                    $(this.element).append(newIframe);
                                }
                            }
                        });
                    
                    // Refresh waypoints
                    Waypoint.refreshAll();
                } else {
                    // Empty asset set returned. Go back in for a real set
                    populateInfinitySet(sNextUrl);
                }
            });
        }

        // Infinite waypoint
        var waypoint = new Waypoint({
            element: document.getElementById('infinite-container'),
            handler: function(direction) {
                if (direction == 'down') {
                    if (bInfiniStop == true) {                        
                        // FINISHED. Kill the waypoint
                        this.destroy();
                    } else {
                        // Log waypoint hit event
                        __tnt.trackEvent({'category':'infinity-scroll','action':'request', 'label':'assets requested', 'value': true});
                        var nextURL =  $('#infinite-more').data('next-url');
                        populateInfinitySet($('#infinite-more').data('next-url'));
                    }
                }
            },
            offset: 'bottom-in-view'
        });

        // Infinity ad
        function infinityAd() {
            var newIframe = document.createElement('iframe');
            newIframe.scrolling = 'no';
            newIframe.src = 'http://poststar.com/tncms/block/1421721/?disableTNStatsTracker=1';
            return newIframe;
        }
        // Rewrite URL to for preview
        function scrubURL(sURL) {
            if (typeof sURL != 'undefined'){
                return sURL;
            }
        }
    </script>

<div class="asset-content subscriber-premium" itemprop="articleBody">
<div class="subscriber-preview"><p>Due to a main break Friday afternoon, the Southern Monroe Water Authority issued a 48-hour boil order for The Bluffs subdivision. Customers are asked to boil water used for drinking or cooking for five minutes prior to use.</p></div><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_bottom"></div>

        jQuery(document).ready(function($){
            var bThrottle = false;
            var $region = $('#tncms-region-asset_side_sticky');

            if (
                $region.is(':empty') === false &&
                $('.main-sidebar').height() + $(window).height() < $('.main-content').height() &&
                window.innerWidth >= 992
            ) {
                var $tempRegion = $('<div id="asset_side_sticky-placeholder"></div>');
                $region.before($tempRegion);
                $region.width( $tempRegion.width() );

                $(window).on('scroll mousewheel', function(){
                    if( bThrottle === false ){
                        bThrottle = true;

                        setTimeout(function(){
                            var iFixPoint = $region.offset().top - 30;
                            var iCurPoint = $(this).scrollTop();

                            if (iCurPoint < $tempRegion.offset().top - 30) {
                                $region.css('top', null);
                                $region.removeClass('affix');
                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');

                            } else if (
                                __tnt.elementOnScreen('#infinite-container') ||
                                __tnt.elementOnScreen('#site-footer-container')
                            ) {
                                $region.removeClass('affix')
                                $region.addClass('affix-bottom');

                            } else {
                                $region.css('top', 30);
                                $region.addClass('affix');
                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');
                            }
                            bThrottle = false;
                        }, 25);
                    }
                });

                $(window).on('resize', function(){
                    $region.width( $tempRegion.width() );
                });
            }
        });
    </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  (function ($, list){
    var ajaxUrl = $(".site-nav-list").eq(0).attr('ajaxurl');
	var domain = window.location.host;
    var overSupernav = false;
    var mousehover;
    var theTimer;
    var itemArray = list.substring(1).split(",");
    var haveMenu = {};
    var z = itemArray.length - 1;
    for(; z > -1; z--) {
        haveMenu[itemArray[z]] = [false,false];/*first parameter is used to judge if the nav item have load the ajax html dom node, the second parameter is used to judge if the nav item  have sent the ajax url request*/
    };
    
    $(".supernav").mouseleave(function(){ 
        allInvis(); 
    }).mouseenter(function(){ 
        overSupernav = true; 
    });

    function bindSuperNavEvent(filterSubClassString) {
        $(filterSubClassString).mouseenter(function(){ 
            overSupernav = true; 
        });
    
        $(filterSubClassString).mouseleave(function(){ 
            allInvis(); 
        });
    };
    
    function checkForIt(){
        clearInterval(theTimer);
        theTimer = setInterval(function(){ 
        clearInterval(theTimer);
        if(overSupernav == false){ 
        allInvis(); 
        } 
        }, 1000);
        
    };
    
    var allInvis = function(){
        overSupernav = false;
        clearInterval(theTimer);
        var theSupernav = $(".supernav");
        theSupernav.addClass("supernav-vis");
        for(var t = 0; t < itemArray.length; t++){
            var finderClassString = ".site-nav-"+itemArray[t]+"-link";
             if (itemArray[t] == "local") {
                $(finderClassString).removeClass("teg-gen");
            } else {
                $(finderClassString).removeClass("teg-" + itemArray[t])
            }
        }
    };
    
    var handleHoverEvent = function(i,flag) {
        (function(index){
            var finderClassString = ".site-nav-"+itemArray[index]+"-link";
            var finderSubClassString = "."+itemArray[index]+"-supernav";
            $(finderClassString).mouseover(function(){
                mousehover = this;
                var self = this;
                var preAjaxUrl = ajaxUrl;
                var friendlyURL = $(this).attr('friendlyURL');
                 var url = "http://"+ domain + preAjaxUrl.replace("frendlyUrl_place_holder", friendlyURL).replace("module_instance_id_place_holder","MOD-NAVIGAION-HEADLINE-LIST");
                if(friendlyURL != null && haveMenu[itemArray[index]][0] == false && haveMenu[itemArray[index]][1] == false) {
                    haveMenu[itemArray[index]][1] = true;
                    $.ajax({
                            type: "GET",
                            url: url,
                            current:self,
                            success:function(html){
                                $("header.site-header").eq(0).after(html.trim());
                                haveMenu[itemArray[index]][0] = true;
                                bindSuperNavEvent(finderSubClassString);
                                if(flag) {
                                    $(finderClassString).addClass("teg-gen"); 
                                } else {
                                    $(finderClassString).addClass("teg-"+itemArray[index]);
                                }
                                if(self == mousehover) {
                                    allInvis();
                                    $(finderSubClassString).removeClass("supernav-vis");
                                }
                            },
                            error:function(){
                                haveMenu[itemArray[index]][1] = false;
                            }
                        });
                } else if(haveMenu[itemArray[index]][0]) {
                    allInvis(); 
                    if(flag) {
                        $(finderClassString).addClass("teg-gen"); 
                    } else {
                        $(finderClassString).addClass("teg-"+itemArray[index]);
                    }
                    $(finderSubClassString).removeClass("supernav-vis");
                };
            });
                
            $(finderClassString).mouseout(function(){
                mousehover = null;
                checkForIt();
            });
        })(i);
    };
    
    (function(){
      for(var i = 0; i< itemArray.length; i++){
        if (itemArray[i] == "local") {
            handleHoverEvent(i,true);
        } else {
            handleHoverEvent(i,false);
        }
      }
    })();

        event.preventDefault();
    }

    function onNavTouchEnd(event) {
        pageNav.data('nav-open', event.target);
        pageBody.on('touchend', onBodyTouchEnd);
    }

    function onNavTouchStart(event) {
        /* Simulate click behavior if this nav has been tapped once before */
        if (pageNav.data('nav-open') == event.target) {
            window.location.href = event.currentTarget.href;
        }
        /* Disable click event */
        if (pageNav.data('click-bound') != true) {
            pageNav.on('click', siteNavLinkString, onNavClick)
            pageNav.data('click-bound', true);
        }
        pageNav.data('nav-open', null);
    }

    function onBodyTouchEnd(event) {
        var $target = $(event.target);
        if ($target.not(siteNavString) && $target.parents(siteNavString).length === 0) {
            pageBody.off('touchend', onBodyTouchEnd);
            pageNav.data('nav-open', null);
            allInvis();
        }
    }
    pageNav.on('touchstart', siteNavLinkString, onNavTouchStart)
        .on('touchend', siteNavLinkString, onNavTouchEnd);
    /* end touch events section */
            
    
  })(jQuery, ',weather,local,traffic,sports,features,about');

<p></p><p><span style="color: #333333;">STANLEY, N.C. -- A problem with the main water line in Stanley in Gaston County is disrupting service to customers. Authorities say a contractor installing cable hit the water main.</span></p><p></p><p><span style="color: #333333;">People are dealing with low pressure, and even outages in some places, due to the ruptured water main.</span></p><p><span style="color: #333333;">Officials say this increases the potential for bacteria in the system, meaning customers are advised to boil water when service resumes. The Division of Water Resources says to do this before any consumption including drinking, making ice, brushing teeth, washing dishes and food preparation.</span></p><p><span style="color: #333333;">Water should be boiled for one minute until further notice.</span></p><p><span style="color: #333333;">Customers are also asked to conserve water.</span></p>

UPDATE: Prairie du Sac chlorinating water system, boil advisory still in effect

Posted: Updated:
Photo: MGN Online

  • Also on WKOW.comMore>>

  • PDF: Boil Water Notice

    PDF: Boil Water Notice

UPDATE --Â  The Village of Prairie Du Sac's Water Department is currently chlorinating the water system in hopes of having the boil advisory lifted after the weekend.

Village of Prairie Du Sac Public Works and Utilities Director Pat Drone told WKOW that they will take four water samples Saturday and four water samples on Sunday. If all eight water samples come back clean, the advisory will be lifted. Monday morning is the earliest they will know if the water is safe to use and consume again.

The boil water order was put into effect on Friday, and remains in effect until further notice.

Read the full notice here.

*****

PRAIRIE DU SAC (WKOW) -- The Village of Prairie du Sac was notified Friday of a contaminated water sample.Â  Because of the results, a boil water order is in effect until further notice.

The advisory states fecal coliform/E.coli bacteria were found in the water supply.Â  These bacteria can make people sick and are a particular concern for those with weakened immune systems.

The water sample was collected October 6 and indicated the presence of coliform bacteria.Â  Further sampling on October 8 confirmed the results.


Symptoms of diarrhea, cramps, nausea, headaches, among others can be caused by these microbes.Â 

To correct the problem, chlorine concentration has been increased to produce a residual level throughout the water distribution system.Â  Additional sampling and testing is being completed.Â 

Residents should use boiled or bottled water until further notice.

Read the full notice here.

__tnt.metering.access.d.push(function(){
    var lastPreview = $("#asset-content").find(".asset-body").find(".subscriber-preview").last();
    var bgColor = '#ffffff'.replace('#','');
    var rValue = parseInt(bgColor.slice(0,2),16);
    var gValue = parseInt(bgColor.slice(2,4),16);
    var bValue = parseInt(bgColor.slice(4,6),16);
    var bgColorRGB = rValue+','+gValue+','+bValue;
    
    $(lastPreview)
        .css({'position':'relative'})
        .append('<div class="redacted-overlay" style="position:absolute;bottom:0;left:0;width:100%;height:'+$(lastPreview).height()+'px;background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba('+bgColorRGB+',0), rgba('+bgColorRGB+',255) 80%);"></div>')
        .after('<div class="subscription-required"></div>');
    
    var count = __tnt.recent.count.get();
    var limit = __tnt.metering.config.sub_limit;
    var remaining = (limit - count);
    
    if(count > limit){count = limit;}
    if(remaining < 0){remaining = 0;}
    
    var messageClass = 'subscription';
    if((count>=__tnt.metering.config.reg_limit)&&(count<__tnt.metering.config.sub_limit)){
        messageClass = 'registration';
    }
    
    var message = $('#template-metering').find('.template.meter.'+messageClass+'[data-count='+count+'][data-registered=false]').first();
    if(__tnt.user.loggedIn){ message = $('#template-metering').find('.template.meter.'+messageClass+'[data-count='+count+'][data-registered=true]').first(); }
    
    if(!message.length){ message = $('#template-metering').find('.template.meter.'+messageClass+'[data-count='+count+']').first(); }
    if(!message.length){ message = $('#template-metering').find('.template.meter.'+messageClass+':not([data-count])').first(); }

    if(message.length){
        var insertionPoint = $('#asset-content').find('.asset-body').find('.subscription-required');
        if(!insertionPoint.length){
            insertionPoint = $("#eedition-subscription");
        }
        if(!insertionPoint.length){
            if($('#asset-content').length){ if(!$('#asset-content').find('.asset-body').length){ $('#asset-content').prepend('<div class="asset-body"></div>'); } }
            $('#asset-content').find('.asset-body').prepend('<div class="subscriber-premium"><div class="subscription-required"></div></div>');
            insertionPoint = $('#asset-content').find('.asset-body').find('.subscription-required');
        }
        
        __tnt.template(
            message,
            insertionPoint,
            true,
            [{
                'element': '.count',
                'html': count
            },{
                'element': '.total',
                'html': limit
            },{
                'element': '.remaining',
                'html': remaining
            }],

                $(element).find("a[data-toggle=collapse]").each(function(){
                    if($(this).attr("href")){
                        $(this).on('click',function(){
                            var href = $(this).attr("href");

                            $(href).collapse('toggle');
                        });
                    }
                });
                
                if(!(__tnt.metering.compatibility().status == 'FAIL: no metering in eedition')){
                    if($("#template-metering").find('.metering-modal').length){
                        $("#template-metering").find('.metering-modal').modal();
                        
                        $('#template-metering').find('.metering-modal').on('shown.bs.modal',function(){
                            $('.subscription-services').trigger('tncms-track-services-displayed');
                        });
                    }
                }
            }
        );
    }
    
    if(__tnt.user.authToken){
        $('#asset-content').find('.subscriber-premium').find('.subscription-required').find('.logged-in').show();
        $('#template-metering').find('.metering-modal').find('.logged-in').show();
        $('#eedition-subscription').find('.logged-in').show();
    }else{
        $('#asset-content').find('.subscriber-premium').find('.subscription-required').find('.not-logged-in').show();
        $('#template-metering').find('.metering-modal').find('.not-logged-in').show();
        $('#eedition-subscription').find('.not-logged-in').show();
    }
    
    if(__tnt.user.services){
        $('#asset-content').find('.subscriber-premium').find('.subscription-required').find('.has-services').show();
        $('#template-metering').find('.metering-modal').find('.has-services').show();
        $('#eedition-subscription').find('.has-services').show();
    }else{
        $('#asset-content').find('.subscriber-premium').find('.subscription-required').find('.no-services').show();
        $('#template-metering').find('.metering-modal').find('.no-services').show();
        $('#eedition-subscription').find('.no-services').show();
    }
        
    if(window.sessionStorage){
        try{
            sessionStorage.setItem('__tnt.metering.wall.viewed',1);
        }catch(e){}
    }
    
    //GTM
    $('.subscription-services').trigger('tncms-track-services-displayed');

});    
__tnt.metering.compatibility = function(){
    var compatible = true;
    var status = "";
    
    /* this checks for compatibility with DOM storage */
    try{
        window.sessionStorage.setItem('__tnt.compatibility',true);
    }catch(e){
        compatible = false;
        status = "FAIL: setItem unsupported";
    };
    if(!compatible){
        __tnt.log(status);
    }
    return {'check':compatible,'status':status};
};

            var bloxServiceVerified = $.cookie('tncms-services-verified');

            /* if service not whitelisted check user service */
            if( bloxServiceVerified != 1 ){
                var bloxServiceIDs = [];
                
                    bloxServiceIDs.push(513);
                
                    bloxServiceIDs.push(539);
                
                    bloxServiceIDs.push(541);
                
                    bloxServiceIDs.push(558);
                
                    bloxServiceIDs.push(576);
                
                if (__tnt.user.services){
                    var bloxUserServiceIDs = __tnt.user.services.replace('%2C',',').split(',');
                    $.each(bloxUserServiceIDs, function(index, value){
                        var serviceID = parseInt(value);
                        if( serviceID != 0 ){
                            if( $.inArray(serviceID, bloxServiceIDs) > -1 ){
                                bloxHasSubscription = true;
                                return false;
                            }
                        }else{
                            bloxHasSubscription = true;
                            return false;
                        }
                    });
                }
            /* service has been whitelisted */
            } else {
                bloxHasSubscription = true;
            }

            /* check for whitelists once per day */
            if( !bloxHasSubscription && !bloxServiceVerified && typeof userWhiteList != 'undefined' && $.isArray(userWhiteList) ) {
                $.getJSON("http://www.heraldtimesonline.com/_services/v1/client_ip_info",function(data){
                    /* create a range */
                    var dataRange = data.ip.split('.');
                    dataRange = dataRange[0]+'.'+dataRange[1]+'.'+dataRange[2];
                    if( jQuery.inArray(data.ip, userWhiteList) > -1 || jQuery.inArray(dataRange, userWhiteList) > -1 ){
                        /* white list machine */
                        $.cookie('tncms-service-validated', 1, { path:'/' });

                        bloxHasSubscription = true;
                    } else {
                        $.cookie('tncms-service-validated', 0, { path:'/', expires:1 });
                        
                        __tnt.metering.check();
                    }
                });

            /* no access */
            }else if( !bloxHasSubscription ){
                __tnt.metering.check();
            }
            
            if(bloxHasSubscription){
                $('.subscriber-only.encrypted-content').each(function(){
                    $(this).html(tncms.unscramble($(this).text()));
                    $(this).show();
                });
                $('.subscriber-hide').show();
            }

            $('#site-container').show();

            // hide loading spinner
            $('.subscriber-load').hide();
        });

            ) {
                var $tempRegion = $('<div id="asset_side_sticky-placeholder"></div>');

                $(window).on('scroll mousewheel', function(){
                    if( bThrottle === false ){
                        bThrottle = true;

                        setTimeout(function(){
                            var iFixPoint = $region.offset().top - 30;
                            var iCurPoint = $(this).scrollTop();

                            if (iCurPoint < $tempRegion.offset().top - 30) {
                                $region.css('top', null);

                            }

                });

Public safety

Ben T. Davis Beach closed to swimming after sewer pipe break

After lockdowns and evacuations for bomb threat, three Pinellas schools all clear

RECOMMENDED READING


Times staff
Published: October 9, 2014

TAMPA â Wastewater crews were fixing a broken sewer pipe Thursday night that's disrupting traffic on Rocky Point and swimming at Ben T. Davis Beach.

Barricades and signs directing traffic were located along N Rocky Point Drive E while crews repaired the 6-inch pipe.

The work was expected to be completed by Thursday night, but it will take until Monday, weather permitting, to restore the roadway.

A health advisory was issued for Ben T. Davis Beach due to the break and spillage. The spillage has been contained, officials said, but the beach was closed to swimming.

        me.interval = config.interval;
        me.interstitialAdConfig = config.interstitialAdConfig;
        me.adCount = 0;
        me.adInterval = config.adInterval;
        /*me.articles = [];
        try {
            if (typeof config.articles === 'object' && config.articles.length > 0) {
                me.articles = config.articles;
            }
        } catch(e) { console.error(e); }*/
    };

    proto.populateLastViewTime = function() {
        var me = nh;
        try {
            var lastViewTimeCookie = parseInt(getCookie('homestreamLastViewTime'));
            me.lastViewTime = lastViewTimeCookie.toString().length === 13 ? lastViewTimeCookie : 0;
        } catch(e) {}
    };

    /**
     * Load next 10 articles when user scrolls/clicks to view articles
     */
    proto.loadNextArticles = function() {
        var me = nh, start = 0;

        if (me.loadedCount > 0) {
            start = me.loadedCount - 1;
        }
        if (me.articles.length > 0 && me.articles.length > start) {
            me.appendArticles(me.articles.slice(start, start + 10));
        }
    };

    /**
     * Refresh article list every X minutes
     */
    proto.refresh = function() {
        var me = nh;
        me.findArticles(me.syncStates);
    };

    proto.syncStates = function(result) {
        var me = nh, UI = nh.UI;

        me.populateLastViewTime();
        if (typeof result === 'object' && result.length > 0) {
            me.lastRefreshTime = new Date().getTime();
            me.syncUnreadCount(result);
            me.syncList(result);
        }
        me._scanForAdContainers();
        me.loadAds();
    };

    proto.syncUnreadCount = function(articles) {
        var me = nh, UI = nh.UI;

        me.unreadCount = 0;
        if (me.lastViewTime <= 0) {
            me.unreadCount = articles.length;
        } else {
            $.each(articles, function(idx, item) {
                if (item.timestamp > me.lastViewTime) {
                    me.unreadCount++;
                } else {
                    return false;
                }
            });
        }

        // Sync up UI: unreadCount / article list
        me.setUnreadCountText();
    };
    
    proto.setUnreadCountText = function() {
        var me = nh, UI = nh.UI;
        
        if (me.unreadCount > 0) {
            if (me.unreadCount > 99) {
                UI.counter.text("99+");
            } else {
                UI.counter.text(me.unreadCount);
            }
            UI.counter.addClass('counter');
            UI.listCount.text('(' + me.unreadCount + ' new stories)');
        } else {
            UI.counter.removeClass('counter');
            UI.counter.text('');
            UI.listCount.text('');
        }
    };
    
    proto.syncList = function(articles) {
        var me = nh, UI = nh.UI;
        
        // Update timestamp of existing list
        UI.list.find('li').each(function() {
            var articleId = $(this).attr('articleId');
            if (articleId && me.loadedArticles[articleId]) {
                date = new Date(me.loadedArticles[articleId].timestamp);
                $(this).find('time').text(getTimeDiff(date));
            }
        });
        
        // If loaded count > 0, then prepend the new created items to the top
        if (me.loadedCount > 0) {
            var latestArticle = me.articles[0],
                prependItems = [];
            $.each(articles, function(idx, item) {
                if (item.timestamp <= latestArticle.timestamp) {
                    if (idx > 0) {
                        prependItems = articles.slice(0, idx);
                        me.articles = prependItems.concat(me.articles);
                    }
                    return false;
                }
            });
            if (prependItems.length > 0) {
                me.prependArticles(prependItems.reverse());
            }
        // Else load the all articles
        } else {
            me.loadedCount = 0;
            me.appendArticles(articles);
        }
    };
    
    proto.prependArticles = function(articles) {
        var me = nh, UI = nh.UI;
        
        $.each(articles, function(idx, item) {
            // Remove the element if it's already in the list
            if (me.loadedArticles[item.articleId]) {
                UI.list.find('[articleId="'+item.articleId+'"]').remove();
            } else {
                me.loadedCount++;
                me.adCount++;
            }
            if (me.adInterval > 0 && me.adCount > me.adInterval) {
                me.adCount = 1;
                me.inserInterstitialAd();
            }
            UI.list.prepend(me.createMediaElement(item));
            me.loadedArticles[item.articleId] = item;
        });
    };
    
    proto.appendArticles = function(articles) {
        var me = nh, UI = nh.UI;
    
        $.each(articles, function(idx, item) {
            if (!me.loadedArticles[item.articleId]) {
                UI.list.append(me.createMediaElement(item));
                me.loadedArticles[item.articleId] = item;
                me.loadedCount++;
            }
        });
    };
    
    proto.findArticles = function(callback) {
        var me = nh;
        
        try {
            $.ajax({
                type: 'GET',
                url: '/cox-customization-portlet/restful/homestream/find_articles',
                data: {
                    "source": "C_HOMESTREAM_SOURCE_AUTOFLOW",
                    "companyId": 10155,
                    "groupId": 12339772
                },
                success: function(result) {
                    try {
                        if (result.storyResultList) {
                            callback(result.storyResultList);
                        }
                    } catch(e) {
                        console.error(e);
                    }
                },
                error: function(e) {
                    console.error(e);
                }
            });
        } catch(e) { console.error(e); }
    };

    proto.createMediaElement = function(article) {
        var me = nh,
            date = new Date(article.timestamp),
            read = date.getTime() < me.lastViewTime ? 'read' : '';
        return '<li class="' + read + '" articleId="' + article.articleId + '"><a href="' + article.url + '?utm_source=homestream&utm_medium=site_navigation&utm_campaign=homestream_click' + '">' +
                 '<h4>' + article.headline + getIcon(article.mediaType) + '</h4>' +
                 '<time>' + getTimeDiff(date) + '</time>' +
               '</a></li>';
    };

    var getIcon = function(mediaType) {
        var ICON = { 'gallery': 'icon-gallery-inline', 'video': 'ep-icon-play', 'livestream': 'ep-icon-play' };
        return ICON[mediaType] ? ' <i class="' + ICON[mediaType] + '"></i>' : '';
    };

    var getTimeDiff = function(date) {
        var now = new Date(),
            diff = now - date,
            diffMinute = Math.ceil(diff/(60*1000));

        if (diffMinute < 60) {
            return diffMinute + (diffMinute <= 1 ? ' minute ago' : ' minutes ago');
        } else {
            var diffHour = Math.round(diff/(60*60*1000));
            if (diffHour < 24) {
                return diffHour + (diffHour <= 1 ? ' hour ago' : ' hours ago');
            } else {
                // get date string
                var dateStr = '',
                    first = new Date(date.getYear(), date.getMonth(), date.getDate()),
                    second = new Date(now.getYear(), now.getMonth(), now.getDate()),
                    dateDiff = Math.ceil((second-first)/(1000*60*60*24));
                if (dateDiff < 7 && date.getDay() < now.getDay()) {
                    var DAYINWEEK = ['Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', ' Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday'],
                        dayStr = (dateDiff === 1 ? 'Yesterday' : DAYINWEEK[date.getDay()]) + ' at',
                        time = date.toLocaleTimeString().split(' ')[0].split(':'),
                        amPM = date.toLocaleTimeString().split(' ')[1],
                        timeStr = time[0] + ':' + time[1] + ' ' + amPM;
                    return dayStr + ' ' + timeStr;
                } else {
                    return dateDiff + ' days ago';
                }
            }
        }
    };
    
    proto.inserInterstitialAd = function() {
        var me = nh, UI = me.UI;
        
        var jqAdRow = $("<li class='with-ad'><div class='portlet-boundary'>" +
                 "<section class='mod-wrapper mod-ad ad-320 slot-rendered' data-ad-json='" + me.interstitialAdConfig + "'>" +
                 "</section></div></div></li>"),
        	jqAd = jqAdRow.find('.mod-ad');

        UI.list.prepend( jqAdRow );
        me._addWaitingAd( jqAd.get(0) );

        me.loadAds();
    };
    
    proto.loadAds = function() {
        var me = nh, UI = me.UI;
        
        if( me.isOpen && UI.waitingAds.length ) {
            // Make refresh call so waypoint can check itself in viewport
            $.each(UI.waitingAds, function(idx, adWatcher){
				adWatcher.refresh();
            });
        }
    };

    var setCookie = function(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
        var d = new Date();
        d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
        var expires = "expires="+ d.toUTCString();
        document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/";
    };

    var getCookie = function(cname) {
        var name = cname + "=";
        var decodedCookie = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
        var ca = decodedCookie.split(';');
        for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
            var c = ca[i];
            while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
                c = c.substring(1);
            }
            if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
                return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
            }
        }
        return "";
    };

    proto.setupUI = function() {
        var me = this;
        
        me.UI = me.UI || {};        
        me.UI.instance = $('#NavigationHomestream_MOD-NAVIGATION_HOMESTREAM_48799' + '.homestream-header');
        me.UI.icon = me.UI.instance.find('.publish-notification');
        me.UI.counter = me.UI.icon.find('span');
        me.UI.homestream = me.UI.instance.find('.homestream');
        me.UI.listCount = me.UI.homestream.find('span.count');
        me.UI.listContainer = me.UI.homestream.children('div.mod-body');
        me.UI.list = me.UI.listContainer.find('ul.list.media');
        me.UI.loader = me.UI.homestream.find('div.loader');
        me.UI.close = me.UI.homestream.find('.homestream-close');
        me.UI.overlay = me.UI.instance.find('.overlay-homestream');
        me.UI.sponsoredAd = me.UI.homestream.find('.mod-header .sponsored');

        me.UI.waitingAds = []; // array of AdWatchers with ad containers waiting to be rendered
        me._scanForAdContainers();
        
        var jqDoc = $(document);
        me.UI.touchImmovable = me.UI.overlay;
        me.UI.clickClosable = jqDoc;
        jqDoc.ready(function(){
            // wait for the rest to get added to DOM
            me.UI.touchImmovable = me.UI.touchImmovable.add('#mobile-header').add('.smart-app-banner').add('#header .off-canvas-menu');
            me.UI.clickClosable = me.UI.clickClosable.add('#toggle-menu');
        });
    };

    proto._scanForAdContainers = function(){
		var me = nh;
    	me.UI.list.find('.with-ad section.mod-ad.ad-320').not('.ad-watching').each(function(idx, ad){
            if( !$(ad).find('.ep-ad-slot').length ){
                me._addWaitingAd( ad );
            }
        });
    };

    proto._addWaitingAd = function( modAd ){
        var me = nh;
        $(modAd).addClass('ad-watching');

        $(document).ready(function(){  // wait for DOM ready since Waypoints code is in theme footer
            
            var onAdVisible = function(adWatcher){
                var jqAd = $( adWatcher.modAd ),
                    adJsonConfig = jqAd.data('ad-json');

                if (!jqAd.find('.ep-ad-slot').length && adJsonConfig && adJsonConfig.targetting && adJsonConfig.targetting.ad_slot.length) {
                    me.UI.waitingAds.splice($.inArray(adWatcher, me.UI.waitingAds), 1); //remove from array
                    adWatcher.destroy();
                    
                    EP.Utils.AdUtils.createIncrementingContent(adJsonConfig, jqAd, "append");
                    jqAd.find('.ep-ad-slot').attr('name', adJsonConfig.targetting.ad_slot[0]);
                }
            };
            
            var adWatcher = new AdWatcher(modAd, me.UI.listContainer, onAdVisible);
            me.UI.waitingAds.push( adWatcher );
            if( me.isOpen ){
                adWatcher.enable();
            }
            
        });
    };

    proto.setEventListener = function() {
        var me = this, UI = this.UI;
        
        // Set events and listener and interactions
        UI.icon.live('click', function(e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            
            me.isOpen ? me.close() : me.open();
        });
        
        var clickClose = function(e){
            e.preventDefault();

            me.close();
        };
        UI.close.live('click', clickClose);
        UI.overlay.click(clickClose);
        /*UI.listContainer.on('scroll', function() {
            var scrollTop = $(this).scrollTop();
            if (scrollTop + $(this).innerHeight() >= this.scrollHeight) {
                me.loadNextArticles();
            }
        });*/
    };
    
    proto.setInitStates = function() {
        var me = this, UI = this.UI;
        
        me.unreadCount = 0;
        me.populateLastViewTime();
        me.lastRefreshTime = new Date().getTime();
        UI.list.find('li').each(function(idx, item) {
            if (!$(item).attr('class') || $(item).attr('class').indexOf('with-ad') < 0) {
                var timestamp = 0;
            
                try {
                    var time = $(item).find('time'),
                        timestamp = parseInt(time.attr('timestamp')),
                        date = new Date(timestamp);
                        
                    time.text(getTimeDiff(date));
                    if (me.lastViewTime < timestamp) {
                        me.unreadCount++;
                    } else {
                        $(item).addClass('read');
                    }
                } catch(e) {}
                
                // Add to loaded article list
                var articleId = $(item).attr('articleId'),
                    url = $(item).find('a').attr('href'),
                    article = { 'articleId': articleId, 'url': url, 'timestamp': timestamp };
                me.loadedCount++;
                me.articles.push(article);
                me.loadedArticles[articleId] = article;
            } else if (me.adInterval > 0 && me.adCount <= 0) {
                me.adCount = idx;
            }
        });
        
        me.setUnreadCountText();
    };
    
    proto.start = function() {
        var me = this;
        
        me.setupUI();
        me.setInitStates();
        me.setEventListener();
        if (me.interval > 0) {
            setInterval(me.refresh, me.interval);
        }
    };

    proto.resetStates = function() {
        var me = this,
            UI = this.UI;

        me.unreadCount = 0;
        UI.counter.text('');
        UI.counter.removeClass('counter');
        
        var viewTime = me.lastRefreshTime > 0 ? me.lastRefreshTime : new Date().getTime();
        setCookie("homestreamLastViewTime", viewTime, 5);
    };

    proto.open = function() {
        var me = this,
            UI = this.UI;
        
        if( !me.isOpen ){
            scrollbarWidth = (typeof scrollbarWidth === 'undefined') ? measureScrollbar() : scrollbarWidth;

            UI.icon.addClass('open');
            UI.homestream.stop(true).slideDown();
            jqHtml.addClass('noscroll');
            jqNeedsScrollPadding.css('padding-right', scrollbarWidth+'px');
            
            // Scroll to top of the list when open it
            UI.listContainer.scrollTo(0);
            
            // Reset homestream state only when closing the list
            //me.resetStates();
            
            // Load sponsored AD when dropdown list opens for the first time
            if (!UI.sponsoredAd || !UI.sponsoredAd.find('.ep-ad-slot').length) {
                var adJsonConfig = UI.sponsoredAd.data('ad-json');
                if (adJsonConfig && adJsonConfig.targetting && adJsonConfig.targetting.ad_slot.length) {
                    EP.Utils.AdUtils.createIncrementingContent(adJsonConfig, UI.sponsoredAd, "append");
                    UI.sponsoredAd.find('.ep-ad-slot').attr('name', adJsonConfig.targetting.ad_slot[0]);
                }
            }
            
            // clicking off closes it
            me._closeHandler = function(e){
                var target = e.target,
                    instance = UI.instance.get(0),
                    // check if click came from itself or within
                    clickedInside = target && (target===instance || $.contains(instance, target));
                if( !clickedInside ){
                   me.close();
                }
            };
            // to prevent body scrolling on IOS touch
            me._moveHandler = function(e){
                e.preventDefault();
                e.stopImmediatePropagation();
                e.stopPropagation();
            };
            UI.clickClosable.bind('click', me._closeHandler);
            UI.touchImmovable.bind('touchmove', me._moveHandler);
            me.isOpen = true;

            $.each(UI.waitingAds, function(idx, adWatcher) {
                adWatcher.enable();
            });
            me.loadAds();
        }
    };
    
    proto.close = function() {
        var me = this,
            UI = this.UI;
        
        if( me.isOpen ){
            jqNeedsScrollPadding.css('padding-right', '');
            jqHtml.removeClass('noscroll');
            UI.homestream.stop(true).slideUp();
            UI.icon.removeClass('open');
            UI.list.find('li').addClass('read');
            UI.listCount.text('');
            
            // cleanup event listeners
            UI.clickClosable.unbind('click', me._closeHandler);
            UI.touchImmovable.unbind('touchmove', me._moveHandler);
            me.isOpen = false;

            $.each(UI.waitingAds, function(idx, adWatcher) {
                adWatcher.disable();
            });
            me.resetStates();
        }
    };

    // source: https://www.npmjs.com/package/measure-scrollbar
    var measureScrollbar = function () {
        var div = document.createElement('div');

        div.style.width = '100px';
        div.style.height = '100px';
        div.style.overflow = 'scroll';
        div.style.position = 'absolute';
        div.style.top = '-9999px';

        document.body.appendChild(div);

        var barWidth = div.offsetWidth - div.clientWidth;

        document.body.removeChild(div);

        return barWidth;
    };

    var AdWatcher = function( modAd, jqWindow, callback ){
        var self = this;
        self.modAd = modAd;
        
        var waypoint = new Waypoint.Inview({
            element: modAd,
            enter: function() {
                callback( self );
            },
            enabled: false,
            context: jqWindow.get(0)
        });
        self.waypoint = waypoint;
        
        self.enable = function(){
            waypoint.enable();
        };
        self.disable = function(){
            waypoint.disable();
        };
        self.destroy = function(){
            waypoint.destroy();
            waypoint = null;
        };
        self.refresh = function(){
            // refresh inner inview waypoints
            if( waypoint.waypoints && waypoint.waypoints.length ) {
                var ways = waypoint.waypoints,
                    i = ways.length;
                while(i--){
                   ways[i].context.refresh();
                }
            }  
        };
    };
    
    var config = {
        source: 'C_HOMESTREAM_SOURCE_AUTOFLOW',
        groupId: 12339772,
        companyId: 10155,
        interval: 0,
        adInterval: 10,
        interstitialAdConfig: '{"adUnitPath":"Seattle_TV/kiro_web_default/news","contentId":"","isCompanion":false,"lazyLoad":"scroll","isOOP":false,"keywords":"soc,world,cup,draw,soc-world-cup-draw","networkID":"12523293","pageUrl":"http%3A%2F%2Fwww.kiro7.com%2Fnews%2Fworld-cup-finalists-gather-at-kremlin-for-tournament-draw%2F656735380%3Futm_source%3Dhomestream%26utm_medium%3Dsite_navigation%26utm_campaign%3Dhomestream_click","pgType":"feed-story","pgId": "656735380","refreshOnResize":false,"siteKey":"","size":[[320, 50]],"sizeMapping":[],"targetting":{"ad_slot":["HS01"]},"wxTargeting":{"skycond":"","weather":"", "temp":""}}'
    };
    var nh = new NavigationHomestream(config);
    EP.Clients.CMG = EP.Clients.CMG || {};
    EP.Clients.CMG.navigationHomestream = EP.Clients.CMG.navigationHomestream || [];
    EP.Clients.CMG.navigationHomestream.push(nh);
    nh.start();
})(jQuery);
</script>

function janrainReturnExperience() {
    var span = document.getElementById('traditionalWelcomeName');
    var name = janrain.capture.ui.getReturnExperienceData("displayName");
    if (span && name) {
        span.innerHTML = "Welcome back, " + name + "!";
    }
}

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
/* --- page-specific settings ------------------------------------------ */
 var janrain_css_file = $(".janrain_css_file").text();
 var janrain_cmgclean_css_file = janrain_css_file + '/janrain_css/cmgclean.css';
 janrain.settings.capture.flowName = 'standard_television';
 janrain.settings.capture.stylesheets = [janrain_cmgclean_css_file];
 
 var currentSiteUrl = document.location.href;
 var currentResult = currentSiteUrl.match("verification_code");
 if (currentResult) {
  janrain.settings.type = 'embed';
  janrain.settings.capture.screenToRender = 'verifyEmail';
 } else {
  janrain.settings.capture.recaptchaPublicKey = '6LeVKb4SAAAAAGv-hg5i6gtiOV4XrLuCDsJOnYoP';
  janrain.settings.capture.setProfileData = '';
  janrain.settings.capture.confirmModalClose = '';
 }

 /* --- define event handlers and start the janrain ui ------------------ */
 function janrainCaptureWidgetOnLoad() {
  if (janrain.capture.ui.hasActiveSession() == false) {
            document.getElementById("captureSignInLink").style.display = '';
            document.getElementById("captureRegisterLink").style.display = '';
            document.getElementById("captureSignOutLink").style.display = 'none';
            document.getElementById("captureProfileLink").style.display = 'none';
  }
 
     janrain.events.onCaptureLoginSuccess.addHandler(function(result) {
            if (currentSiteUrl.match('/auth/login')) {
                var sp = document.location.href.split('next=');
                if (sp.length == 2){
                    window.location = '' + '/' + sp[1].split('&')[0];
                }
            }
            janrain.capture.ui.modal.close();
            if (window.console && window.console.log) console.log(result);
        
   var captureProfileLink = document.getElementById("captureProfileLink");
  
            captureProfileLink.innerHTML = result.userData.displayName;
            document.getElementById("captureSignInLink").style.display = 'none';
            document.getElementById("captureRegisterLink").style.display = 'none';
            document.getElementById("captureSignOutLink").style.display = '';
            captureProfileLink.style.display = '';
   
            if (result.action != 'ssoSignin' && !EP.Clients.CMG.Util.noRedirectOnJanrainLogin) 
                window.location = captureProfileLink.attributes.href.value;
     });

     janrain.events.onCaptureSessionFound.addHandler(function(result) {
            janrain.capture.ui.modal.close();
            if (window.console && window.console.log) console.log(result);
            
            if (localStorage.getItem('janrainCaptureProfileData')) {
                var profileData = localStorage.getItem('janrainCaptureProfileData');
                profileData = typeof profileData == "string" ? JSON.parse(profileData) : profileData;
                document.getElementById("captureProfileLink").innerHTML = profileData.displayName;
            }
        
            document.getElementById("captureSignInLink").style.display = 'none';
            document.getElementById("captureRegisterLink").style.display = 'none';
            document.getElementById("captureSignOutLink").style.display = '';
            document.getElementById("captureProfileLink").style.display = '';
     });

     janrain.events.onCaptureRegistrationSuccess.addHandler(function(result) {
            janrain.capture.ui.modal.close();
            if (window.console && window.console.log) console.log(result);
        
            if (result && result.userData && result.userData.displayName) {
                document.getElementById("captureProfileLink").innerHTML = result.userData.displayName;
            }
            document.getElementById("captureSignInLink").style.display = '';
            document.getElementById("captureRegisterLink").style.display = '';
            document.getElementById("captureSignOutLink").style.display = 'none';
            document.getElementById("captureProfileLink").style.display = 'none';
     });
  
  janrain.events.onCaptureModalReady.addHandler(function(result) {
            if (currentSiteUrl.match('/auth/login')) {
                janrain.capture.ui.modal.open('signIn');
            }
  });
  
  janrain.events.onModalClose.addHandler(function(result) {
            if (janrain.capture.ui.hasActiveSession() == true) {
                document.getElementById("captureSignInLink").style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById("captureRegisterLink").style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById("captureSignOutLink").style.display = '';
                document.getElementById("captureProfileLink").style.display = '';
            }
     });
  
  janrain.events.onCaptureEmailVerificationSuccess.addHandler(function(result){
            console.log('onCaptureEmailVerificationSuccess', result);
            if(result.userData && result.userData.registrationUrl) {
                window.location = result.userData.registrationUrl;
            }
     });
  
     janrain.events.onCaptureSessionEnded.addHandler(function(result) {
            if (window.location.pathname === '/edit-profile') {
                window.location = '/home';
            } else {
                window.location.reload();
            }
     });

     janrain.events.onCaptureScreenShow.addHandler(function(result) {
            if (result.screen == "returnTraditional") {
                janrainReturnExperience();
            }
     });
        
        janrain.capture.ui.registerFunction('emailValidation', function(name, value, validation) {
            var verifyEmail = function(email, verifyUnique) {
                $.ajax({
                    type: 'GET',
                    url: '/cmg-thirdparty-portlet/restful/janrain/api/verifyEmail',
                    data: {
                        'groupId': '12339772',
                        'companyId': '10155',
                        'email': email,
                        'verifyUnique': verifyUnique
                    },
                    success: function(data) {
                        if (data.emailValidation == 'false') {
                            if (data.errors === 'invalid') {
                                validation.notValid('Please enter a valid email address.');
                            } else if (data.errors === 'duplicate') {
                                validation.notValid('Email address is already being used.');
                            }
                        } else {
                            validation.valid();
                        }
                    }
                });
            };
            switch(name) {
                case 'traditionalSignIn_emailAddress': 
                    verifyEmail(value, false);
                    break;
                case 'traditionalRegistration_emailAddress':
                    verifyEmail(value, true);
                    break;
                case 'email':
                    if (membercenter && membercenter.sdk) {
                        membercenter.sdk.getUserProfile().then(function(profile) {
                            if (profile.email == value) {
                                validation.valid();
                            } else {
                                verifyEmail(value, true);
                            }
                        });
                    }
                    break;
            }
        });
        janrain.capture.ui.registerFunction('displayNameValidation', function(name, value, validation) {
            var displayNameRegex = /^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$/;
            if (displayNameRegex.test(value)) {
                var whitespace = /\s/;
                if (whitespace.test(value)) {
                    //console.log("displayNameValidation false");
                    return false;
                } else {
                    //console.log("displayNameValidation true");
                    return true;
                }
            } else {
                //console.log("displayNameValidation false");
                return false;
            }
        });
        janrain.capture.ui.registerFunction('zipCodeValidation', function(name, value, validation) {
            var zipCodeRegex = /^[0-9]{5}(?:-[0-9]{4})?$/;
            if (zipCodeRegex.test(value)) {
                return true;
            } else {
                return false;
            }
        });
        
     janrain.capture.ui.start();
 }
 
 function janrainWidgetOnload() {
     
        function add_cmg_zip_help(){
            /* add_cmg_zip_help() adds the "question mark" help link after the "POSTAL ZIP"
               label on the register modal. Since the field widgets are dynamically created
               by the janrain js library, the most straightforward way to get the help link
               after the label was to inject it after the janrain js library had rendered the
               fields into the DOM. Also it changes the Janrain field label from "Postal Zip"
               to "Zip Code"
   */
            var d = document.getElementById("capture_traditionalRegistration_form_item_registration_postalZip");
            if (d){
                var modal = document.getElementById("cmg_zip_help_modal");
                var ih = d.innerHTML.replace(/\*Postal Zip/, "Zip Code").replace(/Postal Zip/, "Zip Code");
                var ins_html = ' <a id="cmg_zip_help" href="javascript://">?</a>';
                var chunks = ih.split("</label>");
                d.innerHTML = chunks[0] + ins_html + chunks[1];
                document.getElementById("cmg_zip_help").addEventListener("click", function(){
                    var modal = document.getElementById("cmg_zip_help_modal");
                    var rect = document.getElementById("janrainModal").getBoundingClientRect();
                    modal.style.left = rect.left + 10 + 'px';
                    modal.style.display = 'block';
                });
                document.getElementById('cmg_zip_help_modal'). querySelectorAll('.janrain_modal_closebutton')[0].addEventListener("click", function(){
                    modal.style.display = 'none';
                });
                var nodes_csa = document.querySelectorAll("#capture_traditionalRegistration_form_item_registration_birthday .capture_select_arrow");
            }
            
        }                    


        function reposition_janrain_modal(){
            var h = document.getElementById("header");
            var m = document.getElementById("janrainModal");
            m.style.top = m.offsetTop + h.offsetHeight + 40 + 'px';
            m.style.height = m.offsetHeight + 10 + 'px';
        }

        janrain.events.onCaptureRenderComplete.addHandler(function(){
            add_cmg_zip_help();
            setTimeout(reposition_janrain_modal, 200);
        });
    
 }
</script>

    function getParameterByName(name, url) {
        name = name.replace(/[\[]/, "\\\[").replace(/[\]]/, "\\\]");
        var regexS = "[\\?&]" + name + "=([^&#]*)";
        var regex = new RegExp(regexS);
        var results = regex.exec(url || window.location.search);
        if (results == null)
            return null;
        else
            return decodeURIComponent(results[1].replace(/\+/g, " "));
    }

<script type="text/javascript">
        (function(){
            var epIconMaximizeIconClick = function (popupStreamUrl) {
                var width = 530;
                var height = 404;
                var leftPosition, topPosition;
                leftPosition = window.screen.width - width;
                topPosition = window.screen.height - height - ((window.screen.height -height) / 3);
                window.open(popupStreamUrl, "Window2",
                "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left="
                + leftPosition + ",top=" + topPosition + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=yes,location=no,directories=no");
                var playerList = anvp.getAll();
                for (var index in playerList){
                    var playerid = playerList[index];
                    (function(playerid){
                        anvp[playerid].getState(function(state){
                            if(state == "playing" || state == "loading" || state == "buffering") {
                                anvp[playerid].pause();
                            }
                        });
                    })(playerid);
                };
            }
        
            var maximizeIconOnClick = function(){
                epIconMaximizeIconClick('/popup-livestream');
                
                var playerList = anvp.getAll();
                for (var index in playerList){
                    var playerid = playerList[index];
                    (function(playerid){
                        anvp[playerid].pause();
                    })(playerid);
                };
            };
        
            var originalListener = anvp.pHeaderPlayer.listener;
            anvp["pHeaderPlayer"].listener = function (e) {
                if(originalListener){
                    originalListener(e);
                }
                switch (e.name) {
                    case "PLAYING_START":
                        $('#ep-icon-maximize-icon').click(maximizeIconOnClick);
                    break;
                    case "USER_PAUSE":
                        setCookie('userPaused', true, 30);
                    break;
                }
            };
            
            var setCookie = function(cname, cvalue, exdays){
                var d = new Date();
                d.setDate(d.getDate() + exdays);
                var expires = "expires=" + d.toGMTString();
                document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires;
            }
        })();
        </script>
