<script>
(function($, A, isIframed){
		
		/* utils */
		var timer,
			gCtx = this,
			setLater = function(timer, delay, ctx, fnt, data, periodic){
				killLater(timer);
				return A.later(delay, ctx, fnt, data, periodic);
			},
			killLater = function(timer){
				if(timer){
					timer.cancel();
				}
				return null;
			};
		
		var init = function(){
			
			/* vars */
			var hideCls = 'hidden',
				showCls = 'show',
				calcCls = 'calculating',
				maxHeight = 41,
				hasMore = false,
				$nav = $('#nav-main'),
				$navList = $nav.find('#main-menu'),
				$navLis = $navList.children('li').not('.'+hideCls),
				$navItems = $navLis.not('.more-link'),
				lastIdx = $navItems.length - 1,
				maxPops = $navLis.length,
				count = 0,
				$moreMenu = $navLis.filter('.more-link').first(),
				$moreMenuList = $moreMenu.find('.sub-menu').first(),
				lastWindowWidth,
				listening = [];

			/* functions */
			var checkNav = function(){
					/* reset */
					$nav.addClass(calcCls);
					$navLis.removeClass(hideCls+' '+showCls);
					$moreMenuList.empty();
					hasMore = false;
					lastIdx = maxPops - 1;
					count = 0;

					if( Modernizr.mq('only screen and (min-width: 768px)') ){
						popHide();
						if( !isIframed ){
							navShowStoryList();
						}
					} else {
						$nav.removeClass(calcCls); 
					}
				},

				asyncCheckNav = function(){
					/* Kills other operations waiting with this timer to avoid recursion */
					timer = setLater(timer, 0, gCtx, checkNav); 
				},

				/* If needed, hides the last list item & moves to More menu */
				popHide = function(){
					
					if( count < maxPops && $navList.innerHeight() > maxHeight ){
						var $item = $navItems.eq(lastIdx),
						$clone = $('<li />').append( $item.children('a').clone().removeClass('dropdown-toggle') );
						lastIdx--;
						$item.addClass(hideCls);
						
						$moreMenuList.prepend( $clone );
						if( !hasMore ){
							hasMore = true;
							$moreMenu.addClass(showCls);
						}
						count++;
						/* Call popHide to re-measure */
						timer = setLater(timer, 0, gCtx, popHide); 
					} else {
						/* Done calculating */
						$nav.removeClass(calcCls);
					}
				},
			navShowStoryList = function(){
				var loaded = {};
				for(var i = 0 ; i < lastIdx ; i++) {
					var dropdownContainerCls = 'dropdown-container';
						
					var updateTruncation = function( $container ){
						setLater(null, 250, this, function(){
							EP.Clients.CMG.Util.dotdotdot.add( $container, true );
						});
					};
						
					var $navCont = $navItems.eq(i),
						navEl = $navCont.get(0);
					if( $.inArray(navEl, listening)===-1 ){
						listening.push( navEl );
						$navCont.mouseenter(function(){
							var ajaxUrl = $("#main-menu").attr('ajaxurl');
							var navItem = $(this);
							var navID = navItem.attr('id');
							if( !navID ){
								navID = A.guid('nav-');
								navItem.attr('id', navID);
							}
							
							if (!loaded[navID]) {
								loaded[navID] = true;
								ajaxUrl = ajaxUrl + $("#" + navID).children("span").text();
								$.ajax({
									type: "GET",
									url: ajaxUrl,
								}).done(function(html) {
									if( html && html.indexOf('carousel-wrapper')!==-1){
										
										var dropdownContainer = navItem.find('.'+dropdownContainerCls);
										if( !dropdownContainer.length ){
											navItem.append('<div class="dropdown-menu"><div class="' + dropdownContainerCls + '"></div></div>');
											dropdownContainer = navItem.find('.'+dropdownContainerCls);
										}
										dropdownContainer.append(html.trim());
										A.use('ep-carousel', function(){
											/* Wait for carousel */
											updateTruncation( dropdownContainer );
										});
									}
								})
							} else {
								updateTruncation( navItem.find('.'+dropdownContainerCls) );
							}
							
						});
					}
				}
			};
			
				
			
			var $win = $(window).resize(function(e){
				var wd = $win.width();
				if(wd !== lastWindowWidth){
					/* Only update if there really was a change */
					lastWindowWidth = wd;
					asyncCheckNav();
				}
			});
			checkNav();
		};
		timer = setLater(timer, 10, gCtx, init);
	 })(jQuery, AUI(), false);
</script>

<script>
(function($, modId){
	EP = EP || {};
    EP.Clients = EP.Clients || {};
    EP.Clients.CMG = EP.Clients.CMG || {};
    var CMG = EP.Clients.CMG;
	CMG.Util = CMG.Util || {};
	CMG.Util.story = CMG.Util.story || {};
	/* Waits for DOM manipulation to be complete */
	EP.Clients.CMG.Util.story[modId] = function(callback){
		var getMod = function(){
			return $('#'+modId);
		},
		mod = getMod(),
		ready = 'story-ready',
		checkForModReady = function( md ){
			if(!md.hasClass(ready)){
				md.one(ready, callback);
			} else {
				callback();
			}
		};
		if( mod.length ){
			checkForModReady(mod);
		} else {
			$(document).ready(function() {
				checkForModReady(getMod());
			});
		}
	};
})( jQuery, "story_82160215_185408" );
</script>
<script>
(function() {
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA = EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA || {};
    if (EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.initialized !== true) {
    
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.carousels = EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.carousels || {};
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.players = EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.players || {};
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.slideCounters = EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.slideCounters || {};
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.videoPlayingIndexes = EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.videoPlayingIndexes || {};
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util = EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util || {};
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.applySlideClasses = function(slides, idx, done) {
        var key = idx+'';
        if( !done[key] ){
            var dis = this;
            var cs = 'placeholder-16x9';
            slides.eq(idx).find('.'+cs).each(function(i, el) {
                var $el = $(el);
                var src = $el.attr('data-src');
                var strip = function(){
                    $el.removeClass(cs);
                };
                if(src && $.trim(src)!==''){
                    /* Preload */
                    $('<img/>').load(function () {
                        $(this).remove(); /* prevent memory leaks */
                        strip();
                    }).attr('src', src);
                    /* Backup */
                    A.later(1500, dis, strip);
                } else {
                    strip();
                }
            });
            done[key] = true;
        }
    };
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.slidePreviousClicked = function(model, e) {
        var carousel = $(e.target).parents('.carousel-mixed-media, .carousel-gallery-inline'),
            adContainer = carousel.find('.mixed-media-carousel-ad');
        if (carousel.length > 0 && adContainer.length > 0 && adContainer.css('display') === 'block') {
            EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.hideInterstitialAD(adContainer);
            EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.slideCounters[carousel.attr('id')]++;
        } else {
            if (model.hasPrevious()) {
                model.previous();
            } else {
                model.selectedIndex(model.totalSlides());
            }
        }
    };
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.slideNextClicked = function(model, e) {
        var carousel = $(e.target).parents('.carousel-mixed-media, .carousel-gallery-inline'),
            adContainer = carousel.find('.mixed-media-carousel-ad');
        if (carousel.length > 0 && adContainer.length > 0 && adContainer.css('display') === 'block') {
            EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.hideInterstitialAD(adContainer);
            EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.slideCounters[carousel.attr('id')]++;
        } else {
            if (model.hasNext()) {
                model.next();
            } else {
                model.selectedIndex(0);
            }
        }
    };
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.refreshInterstitialAD = function(carouselId) {
        var adContainer = $('#' + carouselId + ' .mixed-media-carousel-ad');
        if (adContainer && adContainer.length > 0) {
            if (5 && EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.slideCounters[carouselId] === 5) {
                EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.displayInterstitialAD(adContainer);
                EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.slideCounters[carouselId] = 0;
            } else {
                EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.hideInterstitialAD(adContainer);
                EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.slideCounters[carouselId]++;
            }
        }
    };
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.displayInterstitialAD = function(adContainer) {
        var adWrapper = adContainer.find('.mod-wrapper.mod-ad');
        if (adWrapper.length > 0 && adWrapper.data('ad-json')) {
            var adSlot = adWrapper.find('.ep-ad-slot');
            if (adSlot.length > 0 && EP.Utils.AdUtils.ads[adSlot.attr('id')]) {
                EP.Utils.AdUtils.refreshAdWithGptAdSlot(EP.Utils.AdUtils.ads[adSlot.attr('id')].slot);
            } else {
                var adConfigJson = adWrapper.data('ad-json');
                if (adConfigJson && adConfigJson.targetting && adConfigJson.targetting.ad_slot) {
                    EP.Utils.AdUtils.createIncrementingContent(adConfigJson, adWrapper, "append");
                    adWrapper.find('.ep-ad-slot').attr('name', adConfigJson.targetting.ad_slot[0]);
                }
            }
            adContainer.css('display', 'block');
            adContainer.parent('.slides-wrapper').addClass('interstitial-ad-shown');
        }
    };
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.hideInterstitialAD = function(adContainer) {
        adContainer.css('display', 'none');
        adContainer.parent('.slides-wrapper').removeClass('interstitial-ad-shown');
    };
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.refreshThumbsAfterCarouselSwipped = function(currentIdx, thumbs, thumbsContainer) {
        var scrollX = 0;
        thumbs.each(function(index, li) {
            var $li = $(li);
            if(index < currentIdx) {
                scrollX += $li.outerWidth(true);
            }
        });
        thumbsContainer.stop(true).animate({
            scrollLeft: scrollX
        }, "slow");
    };
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.bindThumbArrowsInteraction = function(carousel, thumbsContainer) {
        carousel.find('.thumb-pagination .btn-pager.prev').click(function(e){
            e.preventDefault();
            thumbsContainer.animate({
                scrollLeft: "-=" + thumbsContainer.width() / 2
            }, "slow");
        });
        carousel.find('.thumb-pagination .btn-pager.next').click(function(e){
            e.preventDefault();
            thumbsContainer.animate({
                scrollLeft: "+=" + thumbsContainer.width() / 2
            }, "slow");
        });

<!-- related story headlines starts -->
<!-- related story headlines ends -->
<p><strong>MERCER ISLAND, Wash.</strong> - Mercer Island lifted a six-day boil water advisory Wednesday, but questions linger about the source of the E.coli contamination.</p>
<p>City and health officials took a cautious approach before making the decision.</p>
<p>They waited for more than 100 water tests to come back clear, and kept the advisory in place longer than is typical in similar cases.</p>
<p>Last week, the city was forced to reinstitute an alert after declaring the all clear from a previous boil-water order days earlier, also for E.coli.</p>
<p>The sources of both rounds of contamination have not been found.</p>
<p>City officials intend to hire outside experts to continue the investigation.</p>
<p>Test results to determine whether fecal contamination originated from a human or an animal are still pending.</p>
<p>In the meantime, restaurants are now restoring their full menus in consultation with health inspectors.</p>
<p>Community leaders are planning a campaign to encourage people to support Mercer Island businesses and restaurants, which have been hit hard by the crisis.</p>
<p>Residents are urged to flush out pipes in their home by running cold taps for five minutes, beginning on the upper floors of their homes.</p>
<p><em>Want to talk about the news of the day? Watch free streaming video on the <strong><a href="http://kiro.tv/kiro7app">KIRO 7 mobile app</a></strong> and <strong><a href="http://kiro.tv/kiroiPad">iPad app</a></strong>, and join us here on <strong><a href="https://www.facebook.com/KIRO7Seattle">Facebook</a></strong>.</em></p>
</div>

							slides.eq(idx).find('.'+cs).each(function(i, el) {
								var $el = $(el);
								var src = $el.attr('data-src');
								var strip = function(){
									$el.removeClass(cs);
								};
								if(src && $.trim(src)!==''){
									/* Preload */
									$('<img/>').load(function () {
										$(this).remove(); /* prevent memory leaks */
										strip();
									}).attr('src', src);
									/* Backup */
									A.later(1500, dis, strip);

									strip();

							});

						}
					};
					model.selectedNodeIndex.subscribe(applySlideClasses);

				});

Boil Water Order Issued for Some Holland Heights Residents

Tuesday, October 07, 2014 3:25 p.m. EDT
  • Ann Saliers audio

HOLLAND, MI (WHTC) --Â Residents in the Holland Heights area will have to take the long way home for the next 24 hours or so.Â  Holland BPW has Country Club Rd. shut down between 12th and 16th Streets due to a construction-related water main break.Â  Spokesperson Anne Saliers said there is a boil-water order for some 70 customers living on 16th St.

The hope is to reopen Country Club Rd. by late Wednesday afternoon.Â 

Story by: Â Diane E Coston

<div class="asset-content subscriber-premium" itemprop="articleBody">
<p>BLACK BROOK â The boil-water order for Black Brook Water District No. 1 has been lifted.</p><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_top"></div><p>Two check samples collected on Oct. 1 and 2 were both absent of total coliform bacteria, according to a press release from the Clinton County Health Department.</p><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_middle"><div class="tncms-block visible-xs" id="tncms-block-1108091">
<!-- Mobile Rectangle ATF 300x250 article -->
<div class="visible-xs visible-sm" id="mobileRectangle_atf" style="width:100%;text-align:center">
<script type="text/javascript">
AdBridg.cmd.push(function() { AdBridg.display('mobileRectangle_atf'); });
</script>
</div>
<div class="clear" style="padding-bottom:10px"></div>
</div></div>
<p>The district on Silver Lake Road suffered a water-line break and resulting loss of pressure last week, necessitating the edict.</p><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_bottom"></div>
</div>

                        setTimeout(function(){
                            var iFixPoint = $region.offset().top - 30;

                            ) {

                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');
                            }
                            bThrottle = false;
                        }, 25);
                    }
                });

                });
            }
        });

<div class="entry-content">
<div class="alignright wp-post-thumbnail">
<a data-keyboard="true" data-toggle="modal" href="#thumbnail-modal">
<img alt="" class=" wp-post-image" height="225" sizes="(max-width: 400px) 100vw, 400px" src="https://tribwxin.files.wordpress.com/2014/10/water-boil-advisory.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&w=400&h=225&crop=1" srcset="https://tribwxin.files.wordpress.com/2014/10/water-boil-advisory.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&w=400&h=225&crop=1 400w, https://tribwxin.files.wordpress.com/2014/10/water-boil-advisory.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&w=800&h=450&crop=1 800w, https://tribwxin.files.wordpress.com/2014/10/water-boil-advisory.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&w=150&h=84&crop=1 150w, https://tribwxin.files.wordpress.com/2014/10/water-boil-advisory.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&w=300&h=169&crop=1 300w, https://tribwxin.files.wordpress.com/2014/10/water-boil-advisory.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&w=768&h=432&crop=1 768w" width="400"/> </a>

<div class="modal hide fade" id="thumbnail-modal" tabindex="-1">
<div class="modal-header">
<button aria-hidden="true" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">Ã</button>
<h4 class="title">Boil water order lifted for city ofÂ Lawrence</h4>
</div>
<div class="modal-body">
<img alt="" class="attachment-gallery-cover size-gallery-cover wp-post-image" height="433" sizes="(max-width: 770px) 100vw, 770px" src="https://tribwxin.files.wordpress.com/2014/10/water-boil-advisory.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&w=770" srcset="https://tribwxin.files.wordpress.com/2014/10/water-boil-advisory.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&w=770 770w, https://tribwxin.files.wordpress.com/2014/10/water-boil-advisory.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&w=1540 1540w, https://tribwxin.files.wordpress.com/2014/10/water-boil-advisory.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&w=150 150w, https://tribwxin.files.wordpress.com/2014/10/water-boil-advisory.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&w=300 300w, https://tribwxin.files.wordpress.com/2014/10/water-boil-advisory.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&w=1024 1024w" width="770"/> <div class="lightbox-caption"></div>
</div>
</div>
<p>LAWRENCE, Ind. (Oct. 5, 2014)â A boil order for the city of Lawrence has been lifted following a water main break Friday afternoon.</p>
<p>According to Lawrence Utilities officials, a contractor working near 59th Street and Lee Road tore out a large water main break, causing customers to lose water pressure.</p>
<p>A 48-hour boil water order was issued for any water used for cooking or drinking.</p>
<p>The affected area included Kitley Avenue on the west, 63rd Street on the north, Sunnyside Road on the east and 42nd Street on the south.</p>
<p>Approximately 9,000 customers were impacted.</p>
</div>

4 Kyle businesses issued boil water notice

By Calily Bien Published: October 3, 2014, 5:05 pm
  • Click to share on Twitter (Opens in new window)
  • Click to share on Google+ (Opens in new window)
  • Share on Facebook (Opens in new window)
  • Click to share on Pinterest (Opens in new window)

KYLE, Texas (KXAN) â Four businesses in Kyle are boiling their water after damage was done to a waterline near Kyle Parkway and Interstate 35 this morning.

According to the City of Kyle, a construction contractor struck a 16-inch water line. While the line was fixed within a few hours, due to the extent of the damage to the water line, the following businesses located at the intersection of Kyle Parkway and Interstate 35 have been issued a public notice to boil water order: McDonalds, Whataburger, Chase Bank, & Wells Fargo Bank.

Following normal procedures, city crews will collect samples of the water and send them for bacterial analysis. No residential homes are affected.

Results of the analysis of the bacteriological samples will be ready Saturday afternoon around 5 pm.
